item.title: porting D to GBA
item.description:
intro

D is an excellent language and we wanted it ported to GBA.

why port D?

initially, when we began developing for the GBA, we used devkitarm as a build toolchain, and the makefiles I created for dusk, which in turn were based on tonc makefiles. this worked fine and all, but I really don't love C; it has simplicity going for it, but it's full of ugly syntax, extremely unsafe code, and hidden pitfalls.

item.title: explaining GBA Real-Time Clock (RTC)
item.description:
intro

there’s not much documentation online about how the GBA RTC works, so this blog post will attempt to demystify that. to be honest, i still don’t fully know how the RTC works. i’ll try to explain what i do know, but DISCLAIMER: what i say may not be 100% accurate. you should be able to successfully emulate a working RTC though using this blogpost.
